message.body: Have a lovely time out and about tonight Laura Finch. I love you. Welcome Home!!
Thanks! Have great yoga xxxxxxx
xoxo
Hey lovely. Are you awake? Any chance you'll be in class? Morgan says he'll leave the door open! xxx

Hey gorgeous, how was your New Years? The class last night was fun but a repeat of last year's class. Are you going to yoga Thursday morning? It's my last week without school. Maybe we could have brunch afterwards. What do you think? :)

Yes to thurs morning unless I make late evening plans tonight-i have to work around a friend from chicago who is incapable of planning more than five minutes in advance. But theoretically yes to yoga and brunch! You yoging tonight, or do you have work?xxx
I am Zendo-info tonight instead. I will hope to see you Thursday though! Or maybe Friday for embodied yoga anatomy? That class sounds nerdy and fun! xoxo
Omg, your eggs idea sounds amazing! Are you sure?! I can bring eggs if you want,i just bought some yesterday.xx
We have eggs, no worries! If you have cheese or salsa though that would help. When do you want to come over? xx
I only have eggs in my house,i haven't really been shopping yet! want me to buy cheese, salsa? nine thirty? I have to leave at ten thirty ish, boo.
I think we will be good with what he have on hand. I have Sri racha so that will fill in as salsa. Do you like runny yolks or soft ones or firm ones?
Ooh, runny. This is amazing!
Perfect! Just like me! See you soon!!!
It was so lovely to see you today!!
You too lady lady. Thanks for breakfast deliciousness xxx
Yoga? Also, did Verizon ever come?
I'm making chicken with a boy! Sorry! How was it?xxx

Ooh love it! Chicken with a boy--sounds so cozy. Class was good but you are correct that there is not an apex pose! It was worth it to do head to knee and neck release and to oogle Angie's divine dolphin.
Pilates at 11:45? Heart heart.
Ack, sorry, still at chicken man's. Enjoy! Xxx
Enjoy chicken man for me! If you want to have lunch around 1 let me know, I think I'm treating myself to Atiyah Ola vegan food. It's not broth but its good clean food. xxxxxxxxxxx
Akk, my phone died while I was replying, just got home. How was pilates?xxx
It was good. I feel taller. I didn't get one of the special Pilates mats this time and they help hold down your feet so I wasn't able to do quite as much.
How's little Jam doing?
Jamming along, trying to escape to the great outdoors at all times...!xxx
Oh boy! What a cat! I can't imagine a mouthful of metal! I may want to go to Stephens class (gasp) tomorrow. If I'm not too tired from work. Are you going? Xxxxxxxx
I switched my limbs day to monday. Boo. Enjoy! Don't do headstands if you don't want to!xx
Oh no!!! Boo indeed! I may Pilates instead!
